Package dev.kkorolyov.simpleopts

Class ArgParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.simpleopts.ArgParser

  • public class ArgParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses command line arguments according to an Options object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ArgParser​(Options validOptions, java.lang.String[] args)
      Constructs a new parser with set valid options for an array of arguments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArgParser

        public ArgParser​(Options validOptions,
                 java.lang.String[] args)
        Constructs a new parser with set valid options for an array of arguments. The parser will attempt to parse the arguments array upon instantiation.
        Parameters:
        validOptions - set of all options recognized by this parser
        args - arguments array to parse
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any option in args fails to match to an option in validOptions, or any option requiring an argument does not receive a valid argument

    • Method Detail

      • getParsedOptions

        public java.util.Set<Option> getParsedOptions​()
        Returns:
        all options found by this parser

      • parsedOption

        public boolean parsedOption​(Option toCheck)
        Checks if this parser found a specified option.
        Parameters:
        toCheck - option to check
        Returns:
        true if the specified option was found

      • getArg

        public java.lang.String getArg​(Option key)
        Returns the argument parsed for a specified option.
        Parameters:
        key - parsed option
        Returns:
        argument for the specified option, or null if no argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified option was not found by this parser

      • getValidOptions

        public Options getValidOptions​()
        Returns:
        the set of valid options recognized by this parser

      • getArgs

        public java.lang.String[] getArgs​()
        Returns:
        the arguments parsed by this parser
